data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 2
data.actual_result: You see both options. After clicking one of them they disappear until fully closing Discord.
data.expected_result: You shouldn't get an option to add yourself as a friend or send a message to yourself.
data.short_description: [Visual bug] [Non 4" devices only] You have the option to add yourself as a friend/send a message to yourself
data.steps_to_repro: - Optional step to make sure it works: Fully close Discord (remove it via the app switcher) - Open Discord again - Go to any server - Click on your account in the member list or hold on a message you have sent - Click on "Profile"
